lst.name: sentence
lst.str: He is reluctantly letting government borrowing rise while federal income falls as a result of the tax cuts, which he hopes will stimulate growth and satisfy foreign critics.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Kohl expected no new initiatives from Venice, though he reckoned on confirmation of agreed policies, such as a pact made in Paris in February which sought to stabilize the dollar.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: This view has already been voiced in Washington, where officials spoke at the weekend of behind-the-scenes consultations with Chancellor Helmut Kohl with the aim of securing a quick pledge to take action on the economy.
